name: Zulu Raid
overview: From the game's packaging, "The Zulus were a tribe of fierce warriors, a tribe who could run for eight hours without ceasing once to rest. A tribe for whom killing and savagery were second nature. They wreaked havoc and terror wherever they went. And now you must face them in this game of marksmanship and jungle strategy. ZULU RAID -- A challenge you'll never forget...if you can survive.
